inclusion.criterion: All Inpatients aged 18 to 70 years undergoing ERCP for the first time
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients undergoing ERCP for standard clinical indications
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Ongoing hypotension including those with sepsis
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Cardiac insufficiency (CI, >NYHA Class II heart failure)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 57-year-old man with abdominal pain and vomiting. He drinks around 60 units of alcohol per week and smokes 22 cigarettes per day.
